channel.title: Media on Magnus Ross
channel.description: Recent content in Media on Magnus Ross

item.title: Podcasts about ML
item.description: There are a lot of podcasts out there, and this includes loads that are related to machine learning in some way. Over the summer I’ve worked my way through a fair few of them, so I thought I’d compile a list of my favorites. There are a couple of lists like this out there already, but most of them are out of date, either they include podcasts that are now inactive, or leave out ones that have started recently.
